name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: This records identifiers associated with this care plan that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

name: $addidentifier
desc: This records identifiers associated with this care plan that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: This records identifiers associated with this care plan that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

name: $definition
desc: Returns: Identifies the protocol, questionnaire, guideline or other specification the care plan should be conducted in accordance with.

name: $adddefinition
desc: Identifies the protocol, questionnaire, guideline or other specification the care plan should be conducted in accordance with.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies the protocol, questionnaire, guideline or other specification the care plan should be conducted in accordance with.

name: $basedOn
desc: Returns: A care plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this care plan.

name: $addbasedOn
desc: A care plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this care plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A care plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this care plan.

name: $replaces
desc: Returns: Completed or terminated care plan whose function is taken by this new care plan.

name: $addreplaces
desc: Completed or terminated care plan whose function is taken by this new care plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Completed or terminated care plan whose function is taken by this new care plan.

name: $partOf
desc: Returns: A larger care plan of which this particular care plan is a component or step.

name: $addpartOf
desc: A larger care plan of which this particular care plan is a component or step.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A larger care plan of which this particular care plan is a component or step.

name: $status
desc: Returns: Indicates whether the plan is currently being acted upon, represents future intentions or is now a historical record.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates whether the plan is currently being acted upon, represents future intentions or is now a historical record.

name: $intent
desc: Returns: Indicates the level of authority/intentionality associated with the care plan and where the care plan fits into the workflow chain.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the level of authority/intentionality associated with the care plan and where the care plan fits into the workflow chain.

name: $category
desc: Returns: Identifies what "kind" of plan this is to support differentiation between multiple co-existing plans; e.g. "Home health", "psychiatric", "asthma", "disease management", "wellness plan", etc.

name: $addcategory
desc: Identifies what "kind" of plan this is to support differentiation between multiple co-existing plans; e.g. "Home health", "psychiatric", "asthma", "disease management", "wellness plan", etc.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies what "kind" of plan this is to support differentiation between multiple co-existing plans; e.g. "Home health", "psychiatric", "asthma", "disease management", "wellness plan", etc.

name: $title
desc: Returns: Human-friendly name for the CarePlan.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A description of the scope and nature of the plan.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A description of the scope and nature of the plan.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: Identifies the patient or group whose intended care is described by the plan.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the patient or group whose intended care is described by the plan.

name: $context
desc: Returns: Identifies the original context in which this particular CarePlan was created.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the original context in which this particular CarePlan was created.

name: $period
desc: Returns: Indicates when the plan did (or is intended to) come into effect and end.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates when the plan did (or is intended to) come into effect and end.

name: $author
desc: Returns: Identifies the individual(s) or ogranization who is responsible for the content of the care plan.

name: $addauthor
desc: Identifies the individual(s) or ogranization who is responsible for the content of the care plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies the individual(s) or ogranization who is responsible for the content of the care plan.

name: $careTeam
desc: Returns: Identifies all people and organizations who are expected to be involved in the care envisioned by this plan.

name: $addcareTeam
desc: Identifies all people and organizations who are expected to be involved in the care envisioned by this plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies all people and organizations who are expected to be involved in the care envisioned by this plan.

name: $addresses
desc: Returns: Identifies the conditions/problems/concerns/diagnoses/etc. whose management and/or mitigation are handled by this plan.

name: $addaddresses
desc: Identifies the conditions/problems/concerns/diagnoses/etc. whose management and/or mitigation are handled by this plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies the conditions/problems/concerns/diagnoses/etc. whose management and/or mitigation are handled by this plan.

name: $supportingInfo
desc: Returns: Identifies portions of the patient's record that specifically influenced the formation of the plan.  These might include co-morbidities, recent procedures, limitations, recent assessments, etc.

name: $addsupportingInfo
desc: Identifies portions of the patient's record that specifically influenced the formation of the plan.  These might include co-morbidities, recent procedures, limitations, recent assessments, etc.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies portions of the patient's record that specifically influenced the formation of the plan.  These might include co-morbidities, recent procedures, limitations, recent assessments, etc.

name: $goal
desc: Returns: Describes the intended objective(s) of carrying out the care plan.

name: $addgoal
desc: Describes the intended objective(s) of carrying out the care plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Describes the intended objective(s) of carrying out the care plan.

name: $activity
desc: Returns: Identifies a planned action to occur as part of the plan.  For example, a medication to be used, lab tests to perform, self-monitoring, education, etc.

name: $addactivity
desc: Identifies a planned action to occur as part of the plan.  For example, a medication to be used, lab tests to perform, self-monitoring, education, etc.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies a planned action to occur as part of the plan.  For example, a medication to be used, lab tests to perform, self-monitoring, education, etc.

name: $note
desc: Returns: General notes about the care plan not covered elsewhere.

name: $addnote
desc: General notes about the care plan not covered elsewhere.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: General notes about the care plan not covered elsewhere.
